eu.jpereira.trainings.designpatterns.behavioral.command.service
Interface DBServerInstanceService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReferenceDBServerInstanceService
public interface DBServerInstanceService

This service defines the interfaces clients can use to manage DBServerInstance

Author:
jpereira

CouldNotConnectException - If some error occurs while connecting to the DBServerInstance

InstanceNotFoundException - If the instance could not be found

getInstanceStatus

                                         java.lang.String groupName)
                                         throws CouldNotConnectException,
                                                GroupNotFoundException,
                                                InstanceNotFoundException
Get the status of an DBServerInstance

Parameters:
ipAddress - the IP address of the DBServerInstance being queried
groupName - The Group Name that has the DBServerInstance
Returns:
The DBServerInstanceStatus of the instance
Throws:
CouldNotConnectException - If some error occurs while connecting to the DBServerInstance
GroupNotFoundException - If the goups could not be found
InstanceNotFoundException - if the Instance could not be found
